properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ee Bikira mwezaji,
ave Maria.
Msikilizaji mwombaji,
ave Maria.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Tafadhali nifadhili na uzima
ee mama mwema,
ave, ave, ave Maria.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Duniani daima,
ave Maria.
Tunahitaji msaada,
ave Maria.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Katika udhaifu,
ave Maria.
Utupatie nguvu,
ave Maria.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Msaada wa Wakristu,
ave Maria.
Tupeleke kwa Mungu,
ave Maria.
